channel.title: Doodle 4 Google
channel.description:
[img]http://www.google.com/doodle4google/images/home_whatif.gif[/img]
Welcome to Doodle 4 Google, a competition where we invite K-12 students to play around with our homepage logo and see what they come up with. This year we're inviting U.S. kids to join in the doodling fun, around the intriguing theme "What if...?" At Google we believe in thinking big, and dreaming big, and we can't think of anything more important than encouraging students to do the same. So we hope you'll gather those art supplies and some 8.5x11 landscape paper and encourage your kids to enrich us all with their creative visions of our world, as it is and as it might be. You'll find everything you need to get started here, including detailed lesson plans to incorporate the competition into your curricula. Registration closes on March 28th, and entries are due by April 12th. A panel of judges will select 40 finalist doodles, from which the public will help select a favorite to be featured on our homepage on May 22nd, 2008.
http://www.google.com/doodle4google/ Thought maybe someone would be a bit interested and give it a try..

item.title: Doodle 4 Google
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“javis, post:14, topic:181247”][quote author=YupolaScape link=topic=242681.msg2055560#msg2055560 date=1203135053]
My Art teacher made the whole school enter this last year. She gave us no inspiration and it had to do with school.
[/quote]

where does he say that they picked the best 6 and entered those?[/quote]

implication
or
‘the act of implying’

Read full topic

item.title: Doodle 4 Google
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“javis, post:8, topic:181247”][quote author=YupolaScape link=topic=242681.msg2055560#msg2055560 date=1203135053]
My Art teacher made the whole school enter this last year. She gave us no inspiration and it had to do with school.
[/quote]

how could he make the whole school enter?

[quote]Your school can submit up to six entries. If your school covers more than one grade group, please try to represent an even spread. You might want to hold a contest to select the best doodles in each grade group.
[/quote][/quote]

All the students had to make one, the best 6 were choosen…

Read full topic

Your school can submit up to six entries. If your school covers more than one grade group, please try to represent an even spread. You might want to hold a contest to select the best doodles in each grade group.
